title: A Guide to Stephen King in 2020
itunes:title: A Guide to Stephen King in 2020
itunes:subtitle: The Losers look ahead into the coming months and see where Stephen King will pop up in 2020. There's The Stand on CBS All Access, Lisey's Story on Apple TV+, and possibly another round with Hulu's Castle Rock. But what about all of those...
description:
The Losers look ahead into the coming months and see where Stephen King will pop up in 2020. There's The Stand on CBS All Access, Lisey's Story on Apple TV+, and possibly another round with Hulu's Castle Rock. But what about all of those other adaptations that were announced years ago? Are they coming out? Are they still in development? Head to the Barrens and find out. 


Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
